meanings.sent1: The disclosers shared the secret with their friends.
meanings.sent2: The disclosers were honest about what they knew.
meanings.sent3: The disclosers made a game out of revealing surprises.
meanings.sent4: The disclosers were like open books, revealing all they knew.
meanings.sent5: The disclosers were known for their honesty and openness.

meanings.definition: The act of disclosing or revealing something.
meanings.sent1: The disclosers of the truth were praised for their bravery.
meanings.sent2: The disclosers of the secret caused quite a stir.
meanings.sent3: The disclosers of the surprise did so with a dramatic flair.
meanings.sent4: The disclosers of the news shed light on the situation.
meanings.sent5: The disclosers of the information were like beacons in the dark.
